name: Crime Scene (itch) (dlmedia)
description:
- Click the mouse button in the game window to start

- Move the mouse to look around & the arrow keys to move

- You can also move with the WASD keys & Run by holding the "Shift" key

- Press "C" to crouch ( if you crouch to many times you'll fall through the game)

- Press the "Space" bar to jump

- Press "Esc" to leave the game
